detaileddescription.para: cache_content_read_conf_client_parameter: read the configuration for a client to File Content layer.
Reads the configuration for a client to File Content layer (typically a worker thread).

parameterdescription.para: [IN] a descriptor to the IO for printing the data.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_read_conf_gc_policy: read the garbagge collection policy in configuration file.
Reads the garbagge collection policy in configuration file.

simplesect.para: CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS if ok, CACHE_CONTENT_NOT_FOUND is stanza is not there, CACHE_CONTENT_INVALID_ARGUMENT otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: cache_content_print_gc_pol: prints the garbagge collection policy.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] a descriptor to the IO for printing the data.

briefdescription.para: Management of the file content cache: configuration file parsing.

detaileddescription.para:
